alert.note: Alert for Baker; Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Inland Nassau; Union (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 1:31PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms with heavy rainfall will impact portions of southwestern Nassau, Bradford, northeastern Alachua, southeastern Baker, northeastern Union, western Clay, western Duval and south central Charlton Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 130 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ratliff to near Keystone Heights. Movement was west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Starke, Keystone Heights, Middleburg, Macclenny, Maxville, Cisco Gardens, St. George, Oakleaf Plantation, Lake Geneva and Bryceville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Heavy rainfall rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Baker; Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Inland Nassau; Union
